captions.text: So we're here on the set of "Running Man"
We are the weigookin (*foreigner*) guests
there are about four or five of us here,
and we're gonna be tasting the food that everyone's cooking.
So, we're actually really really excited about this,
um, they have a gigantic crew.
Simon, Martina, and Spudgy...we are a crew of Three!
They have like a million people here.  Take a look!
Wow!
(*sounds of people busily doing stuff*)
I have my giant hoodie on now.
Aren't you hot in that, by the way?
Yeah, I'm about to change
You must be roasting!
I'm so sorry.  We'll be very quick:
Perfect.  Ok.  You ready?
Is it recording?  I have just him.  Should I have you in the picture also?
You know, to prove that you're actually there.
Yeah.  My students will be freaking out.
Ok, you ready?
Oh.  I have galbi breath.  I'm so sorry.
Ok.  Bucheon Yogo, annyeong!  I'm here with someone you might know:
*stuff in Korean that we can't write out.  It's too fast for us!*
Thank you so much Nick!
Bye bye
